title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 4.3 - Relevant provisions of statutes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 4.3 - Relevant provisions of statutes

State Regulations

Relevant provisions of certain statutes relating in whole or
in part to construction and repair contracts are as follows: (a) State Finance Law: section 112; section
114; section 127; article IX, (contracts, comprising sections 135 to 146
inclusive). (b) Canal Law: section
21; section 22; sections 30 to 35 inclusive; section 110. (c) County Law: section 850. (d) Education Law: section 376. (e) Environmental Conservation Law: section
15-2307; section 17-1903; section 17-1907; section 17-1909. (f) Executive Law: section 313. (g) General City Law: section 20-e. (h) General Obligations Law: section
11-102. (i) Highway Law: section
10(4); section 12; section 19; section 38; section 39; section 40; section 59; section 61; sections 82 and 83 on Federal aid highways; section 233. (j) Insurance Law: section 2054; section
2505. (k) Military Law: section
181. (l) Public Buildings Law: section 8; section 9; sections 17 to 24; article 3, comprising sections 40 to
44. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
